Reviews.Title: 2010 HITACHI 42" 1080P HD LCD TV
Reviews.Author: THE TROJAN WARRIOR
Reviews.Content: I purchased this Television approximately two weeks ago and I did a lot of homework before I purchased an LCD TV.  Hitachi is first rate with its consumer electronic products and I also own a Hitachi LCD Camcorder.  This TV rocks!  The picture and sound quality are amazing and after watching television on an old regular flat screen non LCD HD Television, it is a feast for the senses.  The setup was a breeze and I could not be happier with my purchase.  First Rate Product.
